R

RECONNECTION_INTERVAL - Static variable in interface net.sf.openrds.ISystemProperties
This property can be used to override the default interval for reconnection tentatives.
A process node enters in a "disconnected" mode after detecting any communication error with the main node, after that it will keep trying to restabilish the connection continuously at every interval.
The default reconnection interval is 5000 (5 seconds).
REGISTRY_PORT - Static variable in class net.sf.openrds.RegistryHandler
Default port for the RMI Registry
RegistryHandler - class net.sf.openrds.RegistryHandler.
This class is responsible for the RMI Registry control.
RegistryNotActiveException - exception net.sf.openrds.RegistryNotActiveException.
Exception thrown when trying to access the registry handler before initializing it.
RegistryNotActiveException() - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.RegistryNotActiveException
Default Constructor.
RegistryNotActiveException(String) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.RegistryNotActiveException
Default Constructor.
RegistryNotActiveException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.RegistryNotActiveException
Default Constructor.
Requisition - class net.sf.openrds.Requisition.
Represents a requisition that can be serialized thru the network to be processed at any remote machine.
registerNode(INode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.RegistryHandler
Registers the given node on the RMI registry.
After calling this method that node will be available to any remote machine thru the registry.
removeFromControl(IProcessNode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.IMainNode
Removes the given process node from beeing controlled by this main node.
removeNodeEventListener(INodeEventListener) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INode
Removes a node event listener from this node.
removeNodeEventListener(INodeEventListener) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.Node
